verses.verse: <S%H310>Afterward<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H3843>came,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> "This is what <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H1639>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>says,<s%> <S%H5971><s%> 'Let my people <S%H7971>go,<s%> that <S%H7503>they<s%> may hold a <S%H559>feast<s%> to me in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>'"

<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Who is <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> that I should <S%H8085>listen<s%> to his <S%H6963>voice<s%> to let <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>go?<s%> I <S%H3045>don't<s%> know <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and moreover I will not let <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>go.<s%>"

They <S%H559>said,<s%> "The <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%> has <S%H7122>met<s%> with <S%H3212>us.<s%> Please let us go <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>' <S%H1870>journey<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> lest he <S%H6293>fall<s%> on us with <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%> or with the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>"

The <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>them,<s%> "Why do you, Moses and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H6544>take<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> from their <S%H4639>work?<s%> <S%H3212>Get<s%> back to your <S%H5450>burdens!<s%>"
<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5971>"Behold,<s%> the people of the <S%H776>land<s%> are now <S%H7227>many,<s%> and you make them <S%H7673>rest<s%> from their <S%H5450>burdens.<s%>"
The same <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H5065>taskmasters<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and their <S%H7860>officers,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"You shall no longer <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8401>straw<s%> to <S%H3835>make<s%> <S%H3843>brick,<s%> as <S%H8032>before.<s%> Let them <S%H3212>go<s%> and <S%H7197>gather<s%> straw for <S%H8401>themselves.<s%>

The <S%H4971>number<s%> of the <S%H3843>bricks,<s%> which they <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8032>before,<s%> you <S%H7760>require<s%> from <S%H1639>them.<s%> You shall not diminish anything of <S%H7503>it,<s%> for they are idle; therefore they <S%H6817>cry,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3212><s%> 'Let us go and <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to our <S%H430>God.<s%>'

Let heavier <S%H5656>work<s%> be <S%H3513>laid<s%> on the <S%H582>men,<s%> that they may <S%H6213>labor<s%> <S%H8159>therein;<s%> and don't let them pay any attention to <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H1697>words.<s%>"

The <S%H5065>taskmasters<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> went <S%H3318>out,<s%> and their <S%H7860>officers,<s%> and they <S%H559>spoke<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "This is what <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>says:<s%> <S%H5414><s%> 'I will not give you <S%H8401>straw.<s%>

<S%H3212>Go<s%> <S%H3947>yourselves,<s%> get <S%H8401>straw<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> you can <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H3588>it,<s%> for <S%H1697>nothing<s%> of your <S%H5656>work<s%> shall be <S%H1639>diminished.<s%>'"
So the <S%H5971>people<s%> were scattered <S%H6327>abroad<s%> throughout all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H7197>gather<s%> <S%H7179>stubble<s%> for <S%H8401>straw.<s%>

The <S%H5065>taskmasters<s%> were <S%H213>urgent<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3615>"Fulfill<s%> your <S%H4639>work<s%> <S%H1697>quota<s%> <S%H3117>daily,<s%> as when there <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H8401>straw!<s%>"

The <S%H7860>officers<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> whom <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H5065>taskmasters<s%> had <S%H7760>set<s%> over <S%H5221>them,<s%> were beaten, and <S%H559>demanded,<s%> "Why <S%H3615>haven't<s%> you fulfilled your <S%H2706>quota<s%> both <S%H8543>yesterday<s%> and <S%H3117>today,<s%> in making <S%H3835>brick<s%> as <S%H8032>before?<s%>"

Then the <S%H7860>officers<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H6817>cried<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Why do you <S%H6213>deal<s%> this way with your <S%H5650>servants?<s%>

No <S%H8401>straw<s%> is <S%H5414>given<s%> to your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and they <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H6213>us,<s%> 'Make <S%H3843>brick!<s%>' and <S%H5650>behold,<s%> your servants are <S%H5221>beaten;<s%> but the <S%H2398>fault<s%> is in your own <S%H5971>people.<s%>"
But he <S%H559>said,<s%> "You are <S%H7503>idle!<s%> You are <S%H7503>idle!<s%> Therefore you <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3212><s%> 'Let us go and <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>'

<S%H3212>Go<s%> therefore <S%H5647>now,<s%> and work, for no <S%H8401>straw<s%> shall be <S%H5414>given<s%> to <S%H5414>you,<s%> yet you shall deliver the same <S%H8506>number<s%> of <S%H3843>bricks!<s%>"

The <S%H7860>officers<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that they were in <S%H7451>trouble,<s%> when it was <S%H559>said,<s%> "You shall not <S%H1639>diminish<s%> anything from your <S%H3117>daily<s%> <S%H1697>quota<s%> of <S%H3843>bricks!<s%>"
They <S%H6293>met<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> who <S%H5324>stood<s%> in the <S%H7125>way,<s%> as they came <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H6547>Pharaoh:<s%>

and they <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3068>them,<s%> "May Yahweh <S%H7200>look<s%> at <S%H8199>you,<s%> and judge, because you have made us a <S%H7381>stench<s%> to be <S%H887>abhorred<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> to <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> in their <S%H3027>hand<s%> to kill <S%H2026>us.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H136>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H136>"Lord,<s%> why have you brought <S%H7489>trouble<s%> on this <S%H5971>people?<s%> Why is it that you have sent <S%H7971>me?<s%>

For since I <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> in your <S%H8034>name,<s%> he has brought <S%H7489>trouble<s%> on this <S%H5971>people;<s%> neither have you <S%H5337>delivered<s%> your <S%H5971>people<s%> at <S%H5337>all.<s%>"
